{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
{{zh-compound|明|白|to be bright > clear|to be white > clean, bright}} Attested in ''{{w|Zhuangzi (book)|Zhuangzi}}'' ("clear and clean"), ''{{w|Chu Ci}}'' ("bright and clean"), ''{{w|Mozi}}'' ("to be evident, clear"), ''{{w|Tao Te Ching}}'' ("to know, to understand").

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[understand]]; to [[know]]
#: {{zh-x|我 講 的 話 你 '''明白{bai}''' 了 嗎？|Do you '''understand''' what I said?}}
#: {{zh-x|你 在 想 什麼，我 心裡{li} 全 '''明白{bai}'''。|I '''know''' for sure what you are thinking.}}

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|to understand}} {{zh-l|了解}}, {{zh-l|知道}}, {{zh-l|懂}}, {{zh-l|清楚}}

====Usage notes====
When used as a verb, {{zh-l|明白}} conveys an understanding of a meaning or a situation. To express an ability to understand a language, see {{zh-l|會說|to be able to speak}}, {{zh-l|聽懂|to understand when reading}} or {{zh-l|看懂|to understand by listening}}.
